rows.label: tlk70000141_03_msg0001
rows.name:
The coming battle with the Grail...
It will exact a heavy toll on all of us.

rows.label: tlk70000141_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Adel, if the worst happens, you can
entrust the safety of Aletta to me.

rows.label: tlk70000141_03_msg0003
rows.name: But I pray that you all return unharmed.

rows.label: tlk70000141_03_msg0005
rows.name: Are you asking me to go with you?

rows.label: tlk70000141_03_msg0006
rows.name: My apologies. I wish I could.

rows.label: tlk70000141_03_msg0007
rows.name:
Perhaps in my younger days, but with
eight centuries behind me, I am nought
but a feeble old man.
